titleInfo.title: SCREENING IN (2+1)D PURE GAUGE-THEORY AT HIGH-TEMPERATURES

mods.abstract: We compute heavy quark potentials in pure gauge SU(3) at high temperatures in 2+1 dimensions and confront them with expectations emerging from perturbative calculations.

bibliographicCitation.aps: E. Laermann, C. LEGELAND, and B. Petersson, SCREENING IN (2+1)D PURE GAUGE-THEORY AT HIGH-TEMPERATURES, in NUCLEAR PHYSICS B (ELSEVIER SCIENCE BV, 1995), p. 520-522.
